cnd23:202.4: Yo ca kho so, ananda, bhikkhu eko ganasma vupakattho viharati, tassetam bhikkhuno patikankham.
cnd23:202.5: Yam tam nekkhammasukham pavivekasukham upasamasukham sambodhisukham, tassa sukhassa nikamalabhi bhavissati akicchalabhi akasiralabhiti—
cnd23:202.7: Yavatananda, bhikkhu sanganikaramo sanganikarato sanganikaramatam anuyutto, ganaramo ganarato ganasammudito (ganaramatam anuyutto) samayikam va kantam cetovimuttim upasampajja viharissati, asamayikam va akuppanti—

cnd23:202.10: atthanatam sanganikaratassa, yam phassaye samayikam vimuttim.
cnd23:203.4: So paccekasambuddho suriyassa gottanatako gottabandhu, tasma paccekasambuddho adiccabandhu.

cnd23:206.7: Ya evarupa ditthi ditthigatam ditthigahanam ditthikantaro ditthivisukayikam ditthivipphanditam ditthisamyojanam gaho patiggaho abhiniveso paramaso kummaggo micchapatho micchattam titthayatanam vipariyesaggaho viparitaggaho vipallasaggaho micchagaho, ayathavakasmim yathavakanti gaho, yavata dvasatthi ditthigatani—

cnd23:213.12: Tadupadaya lukham civaram dhareti lukham pindapatam paribhunjati lukham senasanam patisevati lukham gilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharam patisevati.

cnd23:213.22: Tadupadaya bahumpi civaram patigganhati, bahumpi pindapatam patigganhati, bahumpi senasanam patigganhati, bahumpi gilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharam patigganhati.

cnd23:215.2: Idhekacco papiccho icchapakato sambhavanadhippayo “evam mam jano sambhavessati”ti ariyadhamme sannissitavacam bhasati.

cnd23:284.13: sadum labhitva asadum pariyesanti, asadum labhitva sadum pariyesanti;
cnd23:284.14: sitam labhitva unham pariyesanti, unham labhitva sitam pariyesanti.
cnd23:284.15: Te yam yam labhanti tena tena na tussanti, aparaparam pariyesanti.
cnd23:284.16: Manapikesu rasesu ratta giddha gathita mucchita ajjhosanna lagga laggita palibuddha.
cnd23:284.17: Sa rasatanha tassa paccekasambuddhassa pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
cnd23:284.18: Tasma so paccekasambuddho patisankha yoniso aharam ahareti—
cnd23:284.19: “neva davaya na madaya na mandanaya na vibhusanaya;
cnd23:284.20: yavadeva imassa kayassa thitiya yapanaya vihimsuparatiya brahmacariyanuggahaya.
cnd23:284.21: Iti purananca vedanam patihankhami, navanca vedanam na uppadessami, yatra ca me bhavissati anavajjata ca phasuviharo ca”ti.
cnd23:285.1: Yatha vanam alimpeyya yavadeva aruhanatthaya, yatha va akkham abbhanjeyya yavadeva bharassa nittharanatthaya, yatha puttamamsam aharam ahareyya yavadeva kantarassa nittharanatthaya;
cnd23:285.2: evameva so paccekasambuddho patisankha yoniso aharam ahareti—
cnd23:285.3: “neva davaya na madaya na mandanaya na vibhusanaya;
cnd23:285.4: yavadeva imassa kayassa thitiya yapanaya vihimsuparatiya brahmacariyanuggahaya.
cnd23:285.5: Iti purananca vedanam patihankhami, navanca vedanam na uppadessami, yatra ca me bhavissati anavajjata ca phasuviharo ca”ti.
cnd23:285.6: Rasatanhaya arato virato pativirato nikkhanto nissato vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharatiti—
cnd23:286.2: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
cnd23:286.3: Sa loluppa tanha tassa paccekasambuddhassa pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
cnd23:287.2: anannapositi so paccekasambuddho attananneva poseti, na paranti.
cnd23:289.1: Anannaposi sapadanacariti so paccekasambuddho pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya gamam va nigamam va pindaya pavisati rakkhiteneva kayena rakkhitaya vacaya rakkhitena cittena upatthitaya satiya samvutehi indriyehi.
cnd23:289.2: Okkhittacakkhu iriyapathasampanno kula kulam anatikkamanto pindaya caratiti—
cnd23:290.1: Kule kule appatibaddhacittoti dvihi karanehi patibaddhacitto hoti—
cnd23:290.2: attanam va nicam thapento param uccam thapento patibaddhacitto hoti, attanam va uccam thapento param nicam thapento patibaddhacitto hoti.
cnd23:290.3: Katham attanam nicam thapento param uccam thapento patibaddhacitto hoti?
cnd23:290.4: “Tumhe me bahupakara, aham tumhe nissaya labhami civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharam.
cnd23:290.5: Yampi me anne datum va katum va mannanti tumhe nissaya tumhe passanta.
cnd23:290.6: Yampi me poranam matapettikam namagottam tampi me antarahitam tumhehi aham nayami—
cnd23:290.8: Evam attanam nicam thapento param uccam thapento patibaddhacitto hoti.
cnd23:291.1: Katham attanam uccam thapento param nicam thapento patibaddhacitto hoti?
cnd23:291.2: “Aham tumhakam bahupakaro, tumhe mam agamma buddham saranam gata dhammam saranam gata sangham saranam gata, panatipata pativirata, adinnadana pativirata, kamesumicchacara pativirata, musavada pativirata, suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirata, tumhakam aham uddesam demi paripuccham demi uposatham acikkhami navakammam adhitthami;
cnd23:291.3: atha ca pana tumhe mam ujjhitva anne sakkarotha garum karotha manetha pujetha”ti.
cnd23:291.4: Evam attanam uccam thapento param nicam thapento patibaddhacitto hoti.
cnd23:292.1: Kule kule appatibaddhacittoti so paccekasambuddho kulapalibodhena appatibaddhacitto hoti, ganapalibodhena appatibaddhacitto hoti, avasapalibodhena appatibaddhacitto hoti, civarapalibodhena appatibaddhacitto hoti, pindapatapalibodhena appatibaddhacitto hoti, senasanapalibodhena appatibaddhacitto hoti, gilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharapalibodhena appatibaddhacitto hotiti—
cnd23:292.2: kule kule appatibaddhacitto hoti, eko care khaggavisanakappo.
cnd23:295.1: Pahaya pancavaranani cetasoti so paccekasambuddho kamacchandanivaranam pahaya pajahitva vinodetva byantikaritva anabhavam gametva, byapadanivaranam …
cnd23:295.4: vicikicchanivaranam pahaya pajahitva vinodetva byantikaritva anabhavam gametva vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharatiti—
cnd23:296.1: Upakkilese byapanujja sabbeti rago cittassa upakkileso, doso cittassa upakkileso, moho cittassa upakkileso, kodho … upanaho …pe… sabbakusalabhisankhara cittassa upakkilesa.
cnd23:296.2: Upakkilese byapanujja sabbeti sabbe cittassa upakkilese byapanujja panuditva pajahitva vinodetva byantikaritva anabhavam gametvati—
cnd23:297.10: Dosoti yo cittassa aghato patighato patigham pativirodho kopo pakopo sampakopo doso padoso sampadoso cittassa byapatti manopadoso kodho kujjhana kujjhitattam doso dussana dussitattam byapatti byapajjana byapajjitattam candikkam asuropo anattamanata cittassa.
cnd23:297.11: Anissito chetva sinehadosanti so paccekasambuddho tanhasnehanca ditthisnehanca dosanca chetva ucchinditva samucchinditva pajahitva vinodetva byantikaritva anabhavam gametva cakkhum anissito,
cnd23:297.13: ditthasutamutavinnatabbe dhamme anissito anallino anupagato anajjhosito anadhimutto nikkhanto nissato vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharatiti—
cnd23:297.14: anissito chetva sinehadosam, eko care khaggavisanakappo.
cnd23:300.1: Vipitthikatvana sukham dukhanca, pubbeva ca somanassadomanassanti so paccekasambuddho sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharatiti—
cnd23:300.2: vipitthikatvana sukham dukhanca, pubbeva ca somanassadomanassam.
cnd23:301.2: Upekkhati ya catutthajjhane upekkha upekkhana ajjhupekkhana cittasamata cittappassaddhata majjhattata cittassa.
cnd23:301.3: Samathoti ya cittassa thiti santhiti avatthiti avisaharo avikkhepo avisahatamanasata samatho samadhindriyam samadhibalam sammasamadhi;
cnd23:301.4: catutthajjhane upekkha ca samatho ca suddha honti visuddha pariyodata anangana vigatupakkilesa mudubhuta kammaniya thita anenjappatta.
cnd23:301.5: Laddhanupekkham samatham visuddhanti catutthajjhanam upekkhanca samathanca laddha labhitva vinditva patilabhitvati—
cnd23:301.6: laddhanupekkham samatham visuddham, eko care khaggavisanakappo.
cnd23:304.2: Yo so sabbasankharasamatho sabbupadhipatinissaggo tanhakkhayo virago nirodho nibbanam.
cnd23:304.3: Paramatthassa pattiya labhaya patilabhaya adhigamaya phassanaya sacchikiriyaya araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya kusalanam dhammanam sampadaya thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesuti—
cnd23:305.1: Alinacitto akusitavuttiti so paccekasambuddho anuppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam anuppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati, uppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya …pe…
cnd23:305.3: uppannanam kusalanam dhammanam thitiya asammosaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahatiti—
cnd23:306.1: Atha va “kamam taco ca nharu ca atthi ca avasissatu, sarire upassussatu mamsalohitam, yam tam purisathamena purisabalena purisaviriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbam na tam apapunitva viriyassa santhanam bhavissati”ti cittam pagganhati padahati.
cnd23:309.1: “Na tavaham imam pallankam bhindissami yava me na anupadaya asavehi cittam vimuccissati”ti cittam pagganhati padahati.
cnd23:310.1: “Na tavaham imamha asana vutthahissami yava me na anupadaya asavehi cittam vimuccissati”ti cittam pagganhati padahati.
cnd23:311.15: rukkhamula nikkhamissami yava me na anupadaya asavehi cittam vimuccissati”ti cittam pagganhati padahati.
cnd23:312.1: “Imasmimyeva pubbanhasamaye ariyadhammam aharissami samaharissami adhigacchissami phassayissami sacchikarissami”ti cittam pagganhati padahati.
cnd23:312.17: pacchime vayokhandhe ariyadhammam aharissami samaharissami adhigacchissami phassayissami sacchikarissami”ti cittam pagganhati padahati.
cnd23:313.1: Dalhanikkamo thamabalupapannoti so paccekasambuddho dalhasamadano ahosi kusalesu dhammesu avatthitasamadano kayasucarite vacisucarite manosucarite danasamvibhage silasamadane uposathupavase matteyyataya petteyyataya samannataya brahmannataya kulejetthapacayitaya annatarannataresu adhikusalesu dhammesuti—
cnd23:313.3: Thamabalupapannoti so paccekasambuddho thamena ca balena ca viriyena ca parakkamena ca pannaya ca upeto hoti samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samupapanno samannagatoti—
cnd23:316.1: Patisallanam jhanamarincamanoti so paccekasambuddho patisallanaramo hoti patisallanarato ajjhattam cetosamathamanuyutto anirakatajjhano vipassanaya samannagato bruheta sunnagaram jhayi jhanarato ekattamanuyutto sadatthagarukoti patisallanam.
cnd23:316.2: Jhanamarincamanoti so paccekasambuddho dvihi karanehi jhanam na rincati—
cnd23:316.3: anuppannassa va pathamassa jhanassa uppadaya yutto payutto samyutto ayutto samayutto, anuppannassa va dutiyassa jhanassa …pe…
cnd23:316.5: anuppannassa va catutthassa jhanassa uppadaya yutto payutto samyutto ayutto samayuttoti—
cnd23:317.1: Atha va uppannam va pathamam jhanam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti, uppannam va dutiyam jhanam …pe…
cnd23:317.3: uppannam va catuttham jhanam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti.
cnd23:318.1: Dhammesu niccam anudhammacariti dhamma vuccanti cattaro satipatthana …pe…
cnd23:318.4: Sammapatipada apaccanikapatipada anvatthapatipada dhammanudhammapatipada silesu paripurakarita indriyesu guttadvarata bhojane mattannuta jagariyanuyogo satisampajannam—
cnd23:318.6: Dhammesu niccam anudhammacariti dhammesu niccakalam dhuvakalam satatam samitam avokinnam ponkhanuponkham udakumikajatam
cnd23:319.1: Avicisantatisahitam phassitam purebhattam pacchabhattam purimayamam majjhimayamam pacchimayamam kale junhe vasse hemante gimhe purime vayokhandhe majjhime vayokhandhe pacchime vayokhandhe carati viharati iriyati vatteti paleti yapeti yapetiti—
cnd23:320.1: Adinavam sammasita bhavesuti “sabbe sankhara anicca”ti adinavam sammasita bhavesu,
cnd23:320.4: “yam kinci samudayadhammam, sabbam tam nirodhadhamman”ti adinavam sammasita bhavesuti—
cnd23:320.5: adinavam sammasita bhavesu, eko care khaggavisanakappo.
cnd23:323.3: Tanhakkhayanti ragakkhayam dosakkhayam mohakkhayam gatikkhayam upapattikkhayam patisandhikkhayam bhavakkhayam samsarakkhayam vattakkhayam patthayanto icchanto sadiyanto pihayanto abhijappantoti—
cnd23:323.5: Appamattoti so paccekasambuddho sakkaccakari sataccakari …pe… appamado kusalesu dhammesuti—
cnd23:324.2: Anelamugoti so paccekasambuddho pandito pannava buddhima nani vibhavi medhavi.
cnd23:324.3: Sutavati so paccekasambuddho bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo.
cnd23:324.4: Ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti, tatharupassa dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha.
cnd23:324.5: Satimati so paccekasambuddho satima hoti paramena satinepakkena samannagatatta cirakatampi cirabhasitampi sarita anussaritati—
cnd23:325.2: Ya panna pajanana …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammaditthi.
cnd23:325.3: Sankhatadhammoti so paccekasambuddho sankhatadhammo natadhammo tulitadhammo tiritadhammo vibhutadhammo vibhavitadhammo “sabbe sankhara anicca”ti sankhatadhammo …pe…
cnd23:325.4: “yam kinci samudayadhammam sabbam tam nirodhadhamman”ti sankhatadhammo natadhammo tulitadhammo tiritadhammo vibhutadhammo vibhavitadhammo.
cnd23:325.5: Atha va tassa paccekasambuddhassa ca khandha sankhitta dhatuyo sankhitta ayatanani sankhittani gatiyo sankhitta upapattiyo sankhitta patisandhiyo sankhitta bhava sankhitta samsara sankhitta vatta sankhitta.
cnd23:325.6: Atha va so paccekasambuddho khandhapariyante thito dhatupariyante thito ayatanapariyante thito gatipariyante thito upapattipariyante thito patisandhipariyante thito bhavapariyante thito samsarapariyante thito vattapariyante thito sankharapariyante thito antimabhave thito antimasamussaye thito antimadehadharo paccekasambuddho.
cnd23:327.4: Niyamam patto sampatto adhigato phassito sacchikato patto niyamam.
cnd23:327.6: So cetaso viriyarambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyamo vayamo ussaho ussolhi thamo dhiti asithilaparakkamo anikkhittacchandata anikkhittadhurata dhurasampaggaho viriyam viriyindriyam viriyabalam sammavayamo.
cnd23:327.7: So paccekasambuddho imina padhanena upeto samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samupapanno samannagato.
cnd23:327.9: sankhatadhammo niyato padhanava, eko care khaggavisanakappo.
cnd23:330.1: Sihova saddesu asantasantoti yatha siho migaraja saddesu asantasi aparisantasi anutrasi anubbiggo anussanki anutraso abhiru acchambhi anutrasi apalayi, paccekasambuddhopi saddesu asantasi aparisantasi anutrasi anubbiggo anussanki anutraso abhiru acchambhi anutrasi apalayi pahinabhayabheravo vigatalomahamso viharatiti—
cnd23:331.2: Vatoti puratthima vata pacchima vata uttara vata dakkhina vata saraja vata araja vata sita vata unha vata paritta vata adhimatta vata verambhavata pakkhavata supannavata talapannavata vidhupanavata.
cnd23:331.4: Yatha vato jalamhi na sajjati na ganhati na bajjhati na palibajjhati, evameva dve jala—
cnd23:331.8: Tassa paccekasambuddhassa tanhajalam pahinam ditthijalam patinissattham, tanhajalassa pahinatta ditthijalassa patinissatthatta so paccekasambuddho rupe na sajjati sadde na sajjati …pe…
cnd23:331.9: ditthasutamutavinnatabbesu dhammesu na sajjati na ganhati na bajjhati na palibajjhati nikkhanto nissato vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharatiti—
cnd23:332.3: Yatha padumapuppham toyena na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati, alittam apalittam anupalittam, evameva dve lepa—
cnd23:332.7: Tassa paccekasambuddhassa tanhalepo pahino, ditthilepo patinissattho.
cnd23:332.8: Tanhalepassa pahinatta ditthilepassa patinisatthatta so paccekasambuddho rupe na limpati sadde na limpati …pe…
cnd23:332.9: ditthasutamutavinnatabbesu dhammesu na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati, alitto apalitto anupalitto nikkhanto nissato vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharatiti—
cnd23:332.10: padumamva toyena alimpamano, eko care khaggavisanakappo.
cnd23:335.1: Siho yatha dathabali pasayha, raja miganam abhibhuyya cariti yatha siho migaraja dathabali dathavudho sabbe tiracchanagate pane abhibhuyya abhibhavitva ajjhottharitva pariyadiyitva madditva carati viharati iriyati vatteti paleti yapeti yapeti, paccekasambuddhopi pannabali pannavudho sabbapanabhute puggale pannaya abhibhuyya abhibhavitva ajjhottharitva pariyadiyitva madditva carati viharati iriyati vatteti paleti yapeti yapetiti—
cnd23:335.2: siho yatha dathabali pasayha, raja miganam abhibhuyya cari.
cnd23:336.1: Sevetha pantani senasananiti yatha siho migaraja arannavanamajjhogahetva carati viharati iriyati vatteti paleti yapeti yapeti, paccekasambuddhopi arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevati appasaddani appanigghosani vijanavatani manussarahasseyyakani patisallanasaruppani.
cnd23:336.2: So eko gacchati eko titthati eko nisidati eko seyyam kappeti eko gamam pindaya pavisati eko patikkamati eko raho nisidati eko cankamam adhitthati eko carati viharati iriyati vatteti paleti yapeti yapetiti—
cnd23:336.3: sevetha pantani senasanani, eko care khaggavisanakappo.
cnd23:339.1: Mettam upekkham karunam vimuttim, asevamano muditanca kaleti so paccekasambuddho mettasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharati tatha dutiyam … tatha tatiyam … tatha catuttham … iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam mettasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena pharitva viharati;
cnd23:339.4: upekkhasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena pharitva viharatiti—
cnd23:339.5: mettam upekkham karunam vimuttim, asevamano muditanca kale.
cnd23:340.1: Sabbena lokena avirujjhamanoti mettaya bhavitatta ye puratthimaya disaya satta te appatikula honti, ye pacchimaya disaya satta …pe…
cnd23:340.10: ye dasasu disasu satta te appatikula honti.
cnd23:340.13: upekkhaya bhavitatta ye puratthimaya disaya satta …pe…
cnd23:340.14: ye dasasu disasu satta te appatikula honti.
cnd23:340.15: Sabbena lokena avirujjhamanoti sabbena lokena avirujjhamano, appativirujjhamano anaghatiyamano appatihannamanoti—
cnd23:340.16: sabbena lokena avirujjhamano, eko care khaggavisanakappo.
cnd23:343.2: Ragoti yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
cnd23:343.3: Dosoti yo cittassa aghato …pe… candikkam asuropo anattamanata cittassa.
cnd23:343.5: Raganca dosanca pahaya mohanti so paccekasambuddho raganca dosanca mohanca pahaya pajahitva vinodetva byantikaritva anabhavam gametvati—
cnd23:344.4: Sandalayitvana samyojananiti dasa samyojanani sandalayitva padalayitva sampadalayitva pajahitva vinodetva byantikaritva anabhavam gametvati—
cnd23:345.1: Asantasam jivitasankhayamhiti so paccekasambuddho jivitapariyosane asantasi anutrasi anubbiggo anussanki anutraso abhiru acchambhi anutrasi apalayi pahinabhayabheravo vigatalomahamso viharatiti—
cnd23:348.1: Bhajanti sevanti ca karanatthati attatthakarana paratthakarana ubhayatthakarana ditthadhammikatthakarana samparayikatthakarana paramatthakarana bhajanti sambhajanti sevanti nisevanti samsevanti patisevantiti—
cnd23:349.5: Nikkarana dullabha ajja mittati ime dve mitta akarana nikkarana ahetu appaccaya dullabha dulladdha sudulladdha ti—
cnd23:350.2: Attatthapannati attano atthaya attano hetu attano paccaya attano karana bhajanti sambhajanti sevanti nisevanti samsevanti patisevanti acaranti samacaranti payirupasanti paripucchanti paripanhantiti—
cnd23:350.4: Asuci manussati asucina kayakammena samannagatati asuci manussa, asucina vacikammena samannagatati asuci manussa, asucina manokammena samannagatati asuci manussa, asucina panatipatena …pe…
cnd23:350.12: asucina byapadena samannagatati asuci manussa, asuciya micchaditthiya samannagatati asuci manussa, asuciya cetanaya samannagatati asuci manussa, asuciya patthanaya samannagatati asuci manussa, asucina panidhina samannagatati asuci manussa, asuci hina nihina omaka lamaka chatukka parittati—
cnd23:351.4: khaggavisanakappoti yatha khaggassa nama visanam ekam hoti adutiyam …pe…
